title: Moonlight & Love Songs
description: When Le Chat Rouge’s pianist, Benoît Grenier, meets the club’s new singer, his world is turned upside down. He’d given up ever finding someone to love. His hopes and dreams of a life beyond the club are revived, while his heart heals.Daniel Marceau has come from Marseille, looking to escape bad decisions and worse memories. He never expected to fall in love, and when his past catches up with him it could ruin the only thing he’s ever found worth living for.Daniel’s fears and his reluctance to ask Benoît for help could cost them everything they’ve worked so hard to create.
author: Alyssa Linn Palmer
